t: Amazon.com: Peak Design Wash Pouch (Sage) : Beauty & Personal Care
s: I bought this Peak Design Wash Pouch to replace a 45-year-old Dopp kit that was fraying and disassembling itself at last. The Wash Pouch is a clever critter. It has just the right combination of small and large interior spaces to hold deodorant, toothbrush, toothpaste, travel size shaving essentials and smaller stuff like wipes, Q-tips, nail nippers, whatever... while keeping wet and dry things separate. It can hang from a hook if there's one in the bathroom ...
